dt2.6:1.1.pli: Rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttoti?

dt2.6:1.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:2.1.pli: Vedanākkhandho … saññākkhandho … saṅkhārakkhandho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto;

dt2.6:2.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:3.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:4.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:5.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:6.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:7.1.pli: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu …pe… manodhātu … manoviññāṇadhātu tīhi khandhehi sampayuttā;

dt2.6:7.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:8.1.pli: Samudayasaccaṃ … maggasaccaṃ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:8.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttaṃ.

dt2.6:8.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:9.1.pli: Nirodhasaccaṃ … cakkhundriyaṃ …pe… kāyindriyaṃ … itthindriyaṃ … purisindriyaṃ …pe… sampayuttanti?

dt2.6:9.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:10.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:11.1.pli: Sukhindriyaṃ … dukkhindriyaṃ … somanassindriyaṃ … domanassindriyaṃ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:11.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:12.1.pli: Upekkhindriyaṃ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena chahi dhātūhi sampayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:12.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:13.1.pli: Saddhindriyaṃ … vīriyindriyaṃ … satindriyaṃ … samādhindriyaṃ … paññindriyaṃ … anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ … aññindriyaṃ … aññātāvindriyaṃ … avijjā … avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;

dt2.6:13.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:13.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:14.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:15.1.pli: Saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto;

dt2.6:15.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.

dt2.6:15.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:16.1.pli: Phassapaccayā vedanā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.6:16.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:17.1.pli: Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā … taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṃ … kammabhavo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto;

dt2.6:17.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.

dt2.6:17.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:18.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi vippayutto.

dt2.6:19.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:20.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:21.1.pli: Soko … dukkhaṃ … domanassaṃ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:21.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:22.1.pli: Upāyāso … satipaṭṭhānaṃ … sammappadhānaṃ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:22.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttaṃ.

dt2.6:22.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:23.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.

dt2.6:23.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:24.1.pli: Jhānaṃ dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:24.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttaṃ.

dt2.6:24.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:25.1.pli: Appamaññā … pañcindriyāni … pañca balāni … satta bojjhaṅgā … ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto;

dt2.6:25.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.

dt2.6:25.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:26.1.pli: Phasso … cetanā … manasikāro tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto;

dt2.6:26.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.

dt2.6:26.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:27.1.pli: Vedanā … saññā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;

dt2.6:27.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:28.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṃ;

dt2.6:29.1.pli: Adhimokkho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena dvīhi dhātūhi sampayutto;

dt2.6:29.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.

dt2.6:29.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;

dt2.6:30.1.pli: Kusalā dhammā … akusalā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:30.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:31.1.pli: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā … dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā ekena khandhena sampayuttā;

dt2.6:31.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:32.1.pli: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā ekena khandhena sampayuttā;

dt2.6:32.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:33.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:34.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:35.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:36.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:37.1.pli: Savitakkasavicārā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:37.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:38.1.pli: Avitakkavicāramattā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:38.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:39.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.

dt2.6:40.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:41.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:42.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā … ācayagāmino dhammā … apacayagāmino dhammā … sekkhā dhammā … asekkhā dhammā … mahaggatā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:42.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:43.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:44.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:45.1.pli: Mahaggatārammaṇā dhammā … appamāṇārammaṇā dhammā … hīnā dhammā … micchattaniyatā dhammā … sammattaniyatā dhammā … maggārammaṇā dhammā … maggahetukā dhammā … maggādhipatino dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:45.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:46.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. –18

dt2.6:47.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:48.1.pli: Paccuppannārammaṇā dhammā … ajjhattārammaṇā dhammā … bahiddhārammaṇā dhammā … ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:48.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:49.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:50.1.pli: Hetū dhammā … hetū ceva sahetukā ca dhammā … hetū ceva hetusampayuttā ca dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;

dt2.6:50.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:50.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:51.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:52.1.pli: Sahetukā ceva na ca hetū dhammā … hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū dhammā … na hetusahetukā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:52.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:53.1.pli: Appaccayā dhammā … asaṅkhatā dhammā … sanidassanā dhammā … sappaṭighā dhammā … rūpino dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:53.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:54.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:55.1.pli: Āsavā dhammā … āsavā ceva sāsavā ca dhammā … āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā ca dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;

dt2.6:55.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:55.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:56.1.pli: Anāsavā dhammā … āsavavippayuttā anāsavā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:56.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:57.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:58.1.pli: Āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:58.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:59.1.pli: Saṃyojanā dhammā … ganthā dhammā … oghā dhammā … yogā dhammā … nīvaraṇā dhammā … parāmāsā dhammā … parāmāsā ceva parāmaṭṭhā ca dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;

dt2.6:59.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:59.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:60.1.pli: Aparāmaṭṭhā dhammā … parāmāsavippayuttā aparāmaṭṭhā dhammā sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:60.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:61.1.pli: Parāmāsasampayuttā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:61.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:62.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:63.1.pli: Anārammaṇā dhammā … cittavippayuttā dhammā … cittavisaṃsaṭṭhā dhammā … upādā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:63.4.pli: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:64.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:65.1.pli: Cetasikā dhammā … cittasampayuttā dhammā … cittasaṃsaṭṭhā dhammā … cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā dhammā … cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno dhammā … cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā.

dt2.6:65.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:66.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:67.1.pli: Upādānā dhammā … kilesā dhammā … kilesā ceva saṅkilesikā ca dhammā … kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā ca dhammā … kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā ca dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;

dt2.6:67.2.pli: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:67.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:68.1.pli: Asaṅkilesikā dhammā … kilesavippayuttā asaṅkilesikā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:68.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:69.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:70.1.pli: Saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā … kilesasampayuttā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:70.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:71.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā … sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:71.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:72.1.pli: Savitakkā dhammā … savicārā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:72.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:73.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.

dt2.6:74.1.pli: Sappītikā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.

dt2.6:74.3.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:75.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:76.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.6:77.1.pli: Na kāmāvacarā dhammā … apariyāpannā dhammā … anuttarā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:77.4.pli: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.6:78.1.pli: Rūpāvacarā dhammā … arūpāvacarā dhammā … niyyānikā dhammā … niyatā dhammā … saraṇā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?

dt2.6:78.4.pli: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.7:1.5.pli: manāyatanena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?

dt2.7:1.6.pli: Te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.7:2.3.pli: manoviññāṇadhātuyā ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:2.4.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.

dt2.7:3.1.pli: Manindriyena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:3.2.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.7:4.1.pli: Upekkhindriyena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:4.2.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.7:5.9.pli: manasikārena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:5.10.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.7:6.1.pli: Adhimokkhena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:6.2.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.

dt2.7:7.1.pli: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttehi dhammehi ye dhammā …

dt2.7:7.2.pli: upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:7.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.7:8.1.pli: Savitakkasavicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:8.2.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.

dt2.7:9.7.pli: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:9.8.pli: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;

dt2.7:10.2.pli: savicārehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā …

dt2.7:10.3.pli: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.

dt2.7:11.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagatehi dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi vippayuttā?

dt2.7:11.2.pli: Te dhammā na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.

dt2.8:1.1.pli: Rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?

dt2.8:2.6.pli: araṇehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
